unnormalised: **Virtual Classrooms: Are They Here to Stay?**
normalised: **Virtual Classrooms: Are They Here to Stay?**

unnormalised: Education tech in India is buzzing! With schools in cities like Chennai and Mumbai still navigating pandemic-related disruptions, virtual classrooms are becoming less of a temporary fix and more of a norm.
normalised: Education tech in India is buzzing! With schools in cities like Chennai and Mumbai still navigating pandemic-related disruptions, virtual classrooms are becoming less of a temporary fix and more of a norm.

unnormalised: Think back to last year's Onam holidays - many kids were probably attending online classes even then! Institutions like IIT-Delhi are experimenting with advanced virtual reality integrations, while smaller schools are focusing on making basic Zoom classes more engaging.
normalised: Think back to last year's Onam holidays - many kids were probably attending online classes even then! Institutions like I I T-Delhi are experimenting with advanced virtual reality integrations, while smaller schools are focusing on making basic Zoom classes more engaging.

unnormalised: It's not all smooth sailing, though. Connectivity remains a hurdle, especially in rural areas. Imagine trying to learn differential equations with a dodgy internet connection! But initiatives are popping up, offering low-cost internet data packages.
normalised: It's not all smooth sailing, though. Connectivity remains a hurdle, especially in rural areas. Imagine trying to learn differential equations with a dodgy internet connection! But initiatives are popping up, offering low-cost internet data packages.

unnormalised: Plus, teachers are becoming real pros at using whiteboards online. And who needs to miss out on biryani at lunch just because you're learning from home? Parents are adapting, kids are adapting - virtual classrooms might just be the next big thing in Indian education.
